profile.name: Eduard
profile.title: Lead Solutions Architect at NTT DATA Europe & LATAM
profile.description:
I am a Lead Solutions Architect with almost ten years of IT/software consulting experience. I have worked on projects for customers of most industries, sizes, and in different countries, mostly with Microsoft technologies, with the main focus on Microsoft SharePoint, Microsoft 365, and Microsoft Azure. With my extensive experience in the technology field, I am able to take on methodology, leadership, and project management responsibilities. 

I am a very sociable, empathetic, communicative, and flexible person. I enjoy sharing knowledge and experience with colleagues and teams I work with. I am always willing to help where I can contribute both professionally and personally. For me, collaboration, proactivity, generosity, autonomy, and organization are key values.

challenges.description: In my role as Lead Solutions Architect, I am responsible for providing technical leadership, guidance and mentorship to the team and help business and IT stakeholders to understand and solve complex requirements using Microsoft 365 and Azure Cloud. I also support our sales team from a technical perspective, providing them with the information and resources they need to successfully sell our products and services.

As a Project Manager with a strong technical background, I was responsible for the successful execution of projects from start to finish. This included planning, resource allocation, monitoring, as well as staff mentoring and ensuring that projects were delivered with the highest quality and a scalable architecture. I have gained extensive experience in the design and implementation of Digital Workplace and Employee Experience solutions as well as in the coordination of multidisciplinary and geographically distributed teams.

As a Microsoft SharePoint technology consultant, I have been responsible for analyzing, designing, and estimating the development of business solutions considering aspects of usability, performance, cost/time, and technology alignment. As team leader, I was in charge of internal/external work-stream follow-up as well as reinforcing development and methodology best practices among colleagues by providing internal training and coaching. I was also involved in SharePoint and .NET solution auditing (coding good practices, performance bottlenecks) and SharePoint 2007 to SharePoint 2013 migrations.

In charge of SharePoint/ASP.net applications maintenance as well as configuration and customization of third-party solutions: Nintex Workflows 2010, SharePoint 2010 FBA Pack among others. Use of the different models/APIs offered by the platform such as Sandbox, SSOM, CSOM and REST. Provide end-to-end functional and technical documentation and end-user support.

details.name: Community Contributor 2022
details.description: Community Contributor badge earners contributed to one or more M365 Platform Community (PnP) initiatives by completing at least one contribution to a PnP initiative within the 2022 calendar year.

details.name: MAP 2014 (Microsoft Active Professional 2014)
details.description: This distinction is given to less than 5% of the professionals population , with in order to recognize their active participation in the community and commitment to keep in touch with the progress of our technologies.

details.name: Excellent achievement in Vocational Training
details.description: The award is given to the students with the higher grades of the graduating class.

studies.name: Microsoft Certified Security, Compliance, and Identity

institution.name: Microsoft
institution.description: Earners of the Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals demonstrate a functional understanding of security, compliance, and identity (SCI) across cloud-based and related Microsoft services.

institution.name: Microsoft
institution.description: Earners of the Azure AI Fundamentals certification have demonstrated foundational knowledge of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and related Microsoft Azure services.

institution.name: Microsoft
institution.description: Earning the Microsoft 365 Fundamentals certification demonstrates an understanding of the options available in Microsoft 365 and the benefits of adopting cloud services, the Software as a Service (SaaS) cloud model, and implementing Microsoft 365 cloud service.

institution.name: Microsoft
institution.description: Earners of the Azure Fundamentals certification have demonstrated foundational level knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.

institution.name: Scrum.org
institution.description: Those who earn the globally recognized Professional Scrum Master I (PSM I) certification have demonstrated a fundamental level of Scrum mastery, including the concepts of applying Scrum, and proven an understanding of Scrum as described in the Scrum Guide. This individual has also demonstrated a consistent use of terminology and approach to Scrum.

institution.name: Microsoft
institution.description: Earners of the MCSD: App Builder certification have demonstrated the skills required to build modern mobile and/or web applications and services. Earning this certification qualifies an individual for a position as an application developer.

institution.name: Microsoft
institution.description: Earners of the MCSA: Web Applications certification have demonstrated the skills required to implement modern web apps. They are qualified for a position as a web developer or web administrator.

institution.name: Microsoft
institution.description: Earning Azure Developer Associate certification validates the skills and knowledge to design, build, test, and maintain cloud applications and services on Microsoft Azure. Candidates participate in all phases of cloud development from requirements definition and design, to development, deployment, and maintenance.

institution.name: Microsoft
institution.description: Earning the Microsoft 365 Certified: Teams Application Developer Associate certification validates the skills and knowledge to design, build, test, and maintain applications and solutions that are optimized for the productivity and collaboration needs of organizations using the Microsoft 365 platform.

studies.name: Higher Technician in Multi-platform Applications Development

institution.name: IES Virgen de la Paloma
institution.description: Developing, installing, documenting and maintaining multi-platform computer applications, using technologies and specific development environments, guaranteeing secure access to data and complying with «usability» and quality criteria required by established standards.
